description.narrative: Research, dialogue and strategies effectively promote inclusive development in national and sectoral policy frameworks

mailing-address.narrative: 4-8 Rangoon Close Ward 24 P.O. Box 5051 Cantoments Accra

sector.narrative: Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty

Contributing to policies reducing child poverty: Poverty reduction strategies, national development plans, engagement with ministries, parliament, international donor and financial organizations, civil society organizations)

title.narrative: Ghana United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Ghana Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Social Policy and Social Protection)
UNICEF Programmes in Ghana (Social Policy and Protection)
Ghana Country Programme Document 2012-2016 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Ghana 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Ghana Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Research, dialogue and strategies effectively promote inclusive development in national and sectoral policy frameworks

description.narrative: UNICEF has made efforts to influence the preparation of the Medium-Term Development Policy Framework (2021-2024) and its related planning guidelines to ensure that they addresses child poverty and other vulnerabilities, especially in the wake of COVID-19. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/08/2020

title.narrative: National government measurement of child poverty using monetary measures
National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures
National policy dialogue on inequality and inclusive development.

baseline.value: Limited policy discussion on government policies to promote inclusive development

target.value: 2020:Annual high-level dialogue on inclusive development and follow-up on at least 2 recommendations

actual.value: 2020:High level inclusive growth forum organized and report with recommendations published and circulated

title.narrative: Dialogue on new evidence of inequalities to enhance inclusive development policy and budget frameworks

baseline.value: Strong new evidence on inequality not included in national policies and budgets

target.value: 2019:Commitments made to address inequalities in forthcoming policy and budget frameworks

actual.value: 2019:Multidimensional child poverty analysis was utilized to improve dialogue at a high level meeting on child responsive inclusive growth.

title.narrative: Multidimensional child poverty is routinely measured and reported by the government

target.value: 2022:The government publishes Multi-diemensional child poverty rate based on MICS

title.narrative: Monetary child poverty is routinely measured and reported by the government

target.value: 2022:The government publishes monetary child poverty rate based on GLSS

title.narrative: Amount (in national currency) allocated from the national budget to new (or expanded) COVID-19 social protection programmes that directly or indirectly benefit children (including on-budget development partner funds) in the reporting year [COVID]

target.value: 2022:Government Medium Term Policy Framework addresses child poverty, vulnerabilities and other issues related to COVID-19
